Good Heart Health Care Enter your registered email address we will get back to you with the reset password link Open Navigation Drawer Close Navigation Drawer Good Heart Health Care is one of the ultra modern healthcare segment in the Bhiwandi town, District Thane , Maharashtra , India. The firm is dedicated for patient oriented, hospitality management and of its unique brand of association with people of different strata of society. The firm has established in 2020 with broader prospect of services to humankind,. Currently operate with one of the most advance Dental and Cosmetic Care center ”Dr. Abrar Momin –Dental Maxillofacial and Cosmetic Center situated at 1st Floor, Hafsaan Ali, Opp. Neelkanth Mandir, Teen Batti, Bhiwandi .> In India, the healthcare industry is undergoing a revolutionary change mainly due to the rising income levels, increasing awareness on lifestyle diseases, changing attitude from prescriptive to preventive healthcare, growing insurance market and increasing government spending on healthcare.The dynamic team of founders identified the retail healthcare need in smaller townships of India and stablished Good Heart Health care firm to serve the people with motto “Any expense on health is an investment”.​The team is finding new partnership and association and certainly will have new horizon by end of the year 2021. Patients are our first priority and we will urge to provide our best medical services at reasonable cost and at the right time.
